outside
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v621/ICMaps/NoMapAvailable.jpg
a hay bale
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason. This soft, flaxen bale acts well as a seat.
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason.
a hay bale
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason. This soft, flaxen bale acts well as a seat.
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason.
a hay bale
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason. This soft, flaxen bale acts well as a seat.
This is one of several hay bales which have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason.
the nearby buildings
The many nearby buildings of Docktown.
the looming dark, storm clouds
A cluster of looming, dark storm clouds loom in the sky above, occasionally being illuminated by wild streaks of lightning.
Dark storm clouds decoratively loom in the sky, occasionally being illuminated by sparks of lightning.
the corpse of a leaf frog
The corpse of a recently deceased leaf frog. It's tiny hands and feet are sprawled outward in an entirely relaxed fashion and it's stretchy tongue hangs limply from the side of it's slack mouth.
The corpse of a leaf frog. It's tiny hands and feet are sprawled outward in an entirely relaxed fashion.
the distance
A focal point far away and completely out of reach.
A focal point far away and completely out of reach.
some flood water
The flood water is about ankle deep and is dangerous on many levels. The fast pace of the water might wash your feet from under you or the debris in the flood water may cause injury.
The flood water is ankle deep and dangerous. You should avoid the debris.
the ground
The snow-dusted rain-speckled ground.
The snow-dusted rain-speckled ground.
several hay bales
Several hay bales have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason. These soft, flaxen bales act well as seats.
Several hay bales have been scattered throughout Docktown for no apparent reason.
the falling raindrops
Fat blue raindrops fall endlessly from the cloud-filled sky to crash land on objects and people everywhere.
Fat blue raindrops fall endlessly from the cloud-filled sky.
small collection of frogs
A small collection of colorful leaf frogs have survived the long fall from above and are scattered about randomly along the thatched rooftops and upper portions of other nearby objects.
A small collection of frogs have survived the fall from above and are scattered about along the thatched rooftops and uppermost portions of other nearby objects.
turret

The many turrets which surround Docktown. They are crafted from large, heavy drab stones and rise several stories from the ground. Piles of snow have drifted and settled upon the tops of the turrets, granting them a "silver" lining.A light drizzle washes away a little of the grime that builds up over the years. The turrets look a tad more real today.
the main wall that encompasses Docktown
The main wall that encompasses Docktown. It is crafted from large, heavy drab stones and rises several stories from the ground.
One of the many windows occupying the nearby buildings. It gives a somewhat foggy view of the building interior.

X[S] \{A myriad of leaf frogs fall from the sky to litter the ground with their colorful bodies.\|Croaks and ribbits can be heard from all around as tiny frogs continue to rain down from above.\|The deafening sound of thunder and a quick streak of white lightning envelop the sky before another score of leaf frogs fall earthbound.\|Water drizzles endlessly from the clouds above.\|A wild streak of lightning zaps a nearby leaf frog, killing it instantly.\|An injured leaf frog hops one-leggedly in the pounding rain for the cover of a nearby tree.\|A shower of colorful creatures fall from the sky in unison with the seemingly endless rain.\|A flurry of leaf frogs drop from the heavens, splattering loudly upon the ground.\|A collection of miniature amphibians are tossed suddenly from the sky. Thuds can be heard everywhere as they roughly connect with the ground.\|A lucky handful of leaf frogs land on a thatched roof before rolling safely to the ground.\|A few leaf frogs survive the long fall from the clouds and can be seen hopping toward the nearby trees for cover.\|A litter of leaf frogs decorate the trunk of one of the nearby trees.\|Splot! Splot! Splot! More frogs fall from the sky, and are dashed into the ground.\|The falling frogs splatter your clothing with small patches of blood and gore.\}

X[S] \{You hear soft groans and coughing from somewhere in the distance. \| A young \{ cat \| ferret \| weasel \| rat \| horse \| wolf \| fox \| boar \} with \{ glassy eyes \| a sweaty brow \| a feverish tone \| shaky hands \} slowly \{ shuffles \| trudges \| paces \| walks \} through the area before disappearing into the distance. \| You hear the haunting sound of a woman crying out in the distance, \{ "No! My baby, no!" \| "Help, someone, anyone! I need a doctor!" \| "Please! Wake up!" \| "Oh God, help us all!" \| "It can’t be, no no!" \} \| A small child with glassy eyes wanders into the area, calling out hoarsely for \{ his \| her \} \{ parents \| mother \| father \| grandmother \| grandfather \}. \| A \{ harried \| feverish \| stressed \| worried \} looking \{ constable \| priest \| cleric \| man \| soldier \} \{ hurries \| strides \| paces \| passes \} through the area, calling out in passing, \{ "Nothing to see, please move along." \| "Everything is fine, please remain calm." \| "Return to your homes, everything is all right." \| Nothing to worry about, it is nothing." \| "Everything will be fine, please, head home to your family!" \} \| A group of \{ foxes \| wolves \| horses \| boars \| cats \| rabbits \} bursts through the area, lugging bags and trunks with them as they disappear into the distance. \| A \{ man \| woman \| fox \| horse \| boar \| wolf \} hurries rapidly through the area, staring at you with mistrust and fear before \{ pulling a scarf over their face \| fleeing into the distance \| marking their body with a religious symbol \| whispering a soft prayer \}. \| A \{ young \| tired looking \| scared looking \| weary \| small \} \{ fox \| boar \| horse \| wolf \| man \| woman \} passes through the area, coughing with a deep, hoarse sounding gasp. \| A group of men in masks haul a cargo wagon laden with bodies through the area. \| A subtle stench permeates the air, laden with acrid aromas of death and smoke. \| A group of \{ horses \| wolves \| boars \| foxes \| rats \} hurry through the area, their haunted eyes staring at you with a mixture of suspicion and fear. \| A rowdy group of young \{ dogs \| cats \| weasels \| mice \} burst into the area, clearly drunk and shouting to one another with a reckless abandon that seems almost desperate. \| A large group of women burst through the area, dragging large satchels and small children behind them as they flee northward. \| A small \{ wolf \| horse \| fox \| boar \| mouse \} collapses in a fit of coughing. A pair of constables appear out of nowhere and drag the individual away into the distance. \| A group of masked individuals slip through the area, ducking in and out of buildings before departing with armfuls of items and goods, running away to disappear into the distance. \| A cacophony of angry shouting can be heard in the distance. \| The sound of breaking glass can be heard somewhere farther away. \| The air is laden with the scent of smoke and sickness. \}

X[S] \{Lightning flashes overhead.\|The crack of thunder echoes loudly.\|\{Cold\|Freezing\|chilly\} winds guide the distant clouds closer and closer.\|The \{swarming\|roiling\|billowing\}\{ mass of storm\|\|\} clouds \{roll over\|cover\|blanket\} Triskellian.\|The fore-wind of the coming storm is burdened with heavy rains.\|Strong winds storm along the streets of the town, spraying their cold, moist message over the wet cobblestones.\|Lightning sears through the storm clouds giving the misty substance an eerie glow for its duration.\|The roar of thunder \{suddenly \|\|\}disrupts the \{natural patter\|sound\} of \{the \|\}rain.\|A \{mixture of \{white\|silver\} and \{yellow\|greenish\}\|bolt of\} lightning \{streaks\|flashes\} across the \{storm\|roiling\|dark\|ominous\} clouds\{, illuminating the massive storm that continues to brew overhead\|\}.\|Strong winds soar inward, loudly whistling as they pass over and around various objects in the area.\|A heavy gust abruptly tears through the room, sending a smattering of objects flying.\|The incessant howling of the wind can be heard from all directions.\|Fat raindrops cascade downward from the heavens in thick sheets.\|The rain mercilessly pounds the area to soak everything it touches in a few short moments.\|Stray leaves fly wildly through the air as they continue to be swept up in a dance with the wind.\|Heavy rain beats noisily down onto the rooftops, drowning out all other sounds in the area.\|The cobblestones grow darker and darker as the rain continues to coat their surface.\|The patter of the torrential rain creates a constant background noise.\|The ferocious wind temporarily lets up, before once again renewing its vigor.\|The driving rain lashes your face.\|Water cascades from the eaves of nearby buildings, creating an impressive waterfall effect.\|A \{large\|peasant\|worried\} \{woman\|maid\|worker\} \{hurries\|rushes\|runs\|splashes\} past, \{shielding\|covering\} herself from the \{rain\|storm\} with \{a heavy cloak\|her arms\|an apron\|a hood\|a blanket\}.\|The cobblestones beneath your feet have become a miniature, raging river.\|Nearby containers begin to fill up with water.\|A young child runs through the area screeching for its mother.\|Constant rain pelts your body.\|The winds suddenly shift, sending the rain flying in a new direction.\|The rain eases up a bit and seems to be lightly sprinkling.\|The wind and rain seems to ease up if only for a little while. \|The storm clouds open up more-and-more releasing new onsets of rain.\|You continue to be showered by the clouds above.\|The rain continues to abusively whip at your body.\|Your clothes cling to your body as they continue to absorb the moisture from above.\|Your shoes become heavy and waterlogged with the increase in the rain.\|A wild streak of lightning crashes down in the distance, and an audible crack can be heard as something breaks and falls.\|The clamor of the rain fills your ears, making all other noises difficult to decipher.\|A sudden crack of thunder can be heard overhead, followed by a torrential downpour.\|A constant stream of rain pours down from the heavens, flooding the area in watery magnificence.\|Rain trickles down the eves of the nearby buildings into the puddles of water that have collected upon the ground to create a rippling effect.\|Lightning flashes overhead, briefly lighting up the ominous, rolling clouds.\|Water drizzles endlessly from the clouds above.\|The driving rain crashes incessantly into the leaves of the nearby trees, sending a scattering of dewdrops flying here-and-there.\|Fat drops of water continue to beat down upon your head and body.\|Yellow lightning shimmies through the clouds to roughly impact a tree branch. An audible cracking noise can be heard as the colorful streak gradually disappears from sight. \}

X[S] \{Howling winds blow through the area, furiously shaking the rooftops and nearby objects as they pass.\|Endless scores of snowflakes cascade rapidly down from the sky to abruptly collide with surrounding objects.\|A crazy flurry of snow crashes down from the heavens to cover the area in a thick cloak of stark white.\|Large flakes of snow continuously pour from the winter clouds, hindering eyesight almost completely.\|A turbulent winter breeze blasts through the area, accompanied by an abusive flow of substantial snow from the heavens.\|A massive shower of snow gushes from the sky to crash into the high-growing piles of white upon the ground.\|Audible thuds and thumps can be heard everywhere as large clusters of snow tumble gracelessly onto the ground. The ever-growing white blanket continues to increase in mass beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of giant snowflakes swirl down from the roiling clouds above before merging clumsily into the enormous blanket of snow consuming the ground.\|A harsh, freezing breeze kicks up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it surging forth into the air.\|Heavy piles of snow continue to build upon the ground. You can hardly recognize any of the objects once familiar to you.\|A litter of sizable snowflakes spew from the sky to roughly collide in a splatter of white with the snowy rooftops.\|Unruly streams of snow bustle about the area, heavily smacking against nearby objects and people.\|The falling snowflakes thunk incessantly against your body to cover your clothing in a noticeable layer of white.\|Torrents of snow rain down from the sky to abuse your body and remind you of the less-than-enjoyable conditions outside.\|The winter storm kicks it up a notch, belting down thick patches of snow joined by bitterly icy winds.\|The spattering of snow that has collected upon your clothes begin to seep through to the skin, chilling you to the bone.\|The stormy winter clouds discharge a thick and heavy burst of snow which promptly devours the ground and nearby objects in its cold embrace.\|The wind feels like it's going through bone and marrow.\}

X[S] wind: \\{ The air hangs, still and calm. \| The \{still\|motionless\|\|\} air is \\{cold\|chilly\|brisk\}\\\{\{freezing\|freezing\|bone-numbingly\|ridiculously\} cold\|freezing\}\ \hot\\\{\{scorching\|scorching\|boiling\|ridiculously\|really\|much too\} hot\|scorching\}\\\{mild\|comfortable\|a nice temperature\}\\ \{warm\|comfortably warm\|a nice temperature\}\ outside. \}\ \\{A gentle breeze caresses your face.\|The \{cold\|frosty\} wind \{gusts\|blows\} past.\}\ \A \{cold\|frosty\|freezing\} \{wind\|burst of wind\} \{gusts\|blows\|blusters\} \{past\|through\}.\
"docktown"
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The solemn tones of the evening bell echo across docktown."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The sound of distant bells mark midday."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Faintly, the chapel bells ring to mark the midnight hour."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The strike of morning bells can be heard across docktown."); return TRUE;

X[S] \{A myriad of leaf frogs fall from the sky to litter the ground with their colorful bodies.\|Croaks and ribbits can be heard from all around as tiny frogs continue to rain down from above.\|The deafening sound of thunder and a quick streak of white lightning envelop the sky before another score of leaf frogs fall earthbound.\|Water drizzles endlessly from the clouds above.\|A wild streak of lightning zaps a nearby leaf frog, killing it instantly.\|An injured leaf frog hops one-leggedly in the pounding rain for the cover of a nearby tree.\|A shower of colorful creatures fall from the sky in unison with the seemingly endless rain.\|A flurry of leaf frogs drop from the heavens, splattering loudly upon the ground.\|A collection of miniature amphibians are tossed suddenly from the sky. Thuds can be heard everywhere as they roughly connect with the ground.\|A lucky handful of leaf frogs land on a thatched roof before rolling safely to the ground.\|A few leaf frogs survive the long fall from the clouds and can be seen hopping toward the nearby trees for cover.\|A litter of leaf frogs decorate the trunk of one of the nearby trees.\|Splot! Splot! Splot! More frogs fall from the sky, and are dashed into the ground.\|The falling frogs splatter your clothing with small patches of blood and gore.\}

X[S] \{Howling winds blow through the area, furiously shaking the rooftops and nearby objects as they pass.\|Endless scores of snowflakes cascade rapidly down from the sky to abruptly collide with surrounding objects.\|A crazy flurry of snow crashes down from the heavens to cover the area in a thick cloak of stark white.\|Large flakes of snow continuously pour from the winter clouds, hindering eyesight almost completely.\|A turbulent winter breeze blasts through the area, accompanied by an abusive flow of substantial snow from the heavens.\|A massive shower of snow gushes from the sky to crash into the high-growing piles of white upon the ground.\|Audible thuds and thumps can be heard everywhere as large clusters of snow tumble gracelessly onto the ground. The ever-growing white blanket continues to increase in mass beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of giant snowflakes swirl down from the roiling clouds above before merging clumsily into the enormous blanket of snow consuming the ground.\|A harsh, freezing breeze kicks up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it surging forth into the air.\|Heavy piles of snow continue to build upon the ground. You can hardly recognize any of the objects once familiar to you.\|A litter of sizable snowflakes spew from the sky to roughly collide in a splatter of white with the snowy rooftops.\|Unruly streams of snow bustle about the area, heavily smacking against nearby objects and people.\|The falling snowflakes thunk incessantly against your body to cover your clothing in a noticeable layer of white.\|Torrents of snow rain down from the sky to abuse your body and remind you of the less-than-enjoyable conditions outside.\|The winter storm kicks it up a notch, belting down thick patches of snow joined by bitterly icy winds.\|The spattering of snow that has collected upon your clothes begin to seep through to the skin, chilling you to the bone.\|The stormy winter clouds discharge a thick and heavy burst of snow which promptly devours the ground and nearby objects in its cold embrace.\|The wind feels like it's going through bone and marrow.\}
